item.title: Bruno José Rodrigues Durães
item.description: Sociologist, professor of Sociology at UFRJ (Department of Sociology/IFCS). Former professor at the Federal University of Recôncavo da Bahia (UFRB) and UNIFAL-MG.

item.title: Alexandre Barbosa Fraga
item.description: Adjunct Professor at the Department of Sociology at the Institute of Social Sciences of UERJ.

item.title: Joyce Louback
item.description: Sociologist and professor at the Faculty of Education at the Federal University of Rio de Janeiro (UFRJ), in the Department of Education Foundations.

item.title: José Victor Yunes da Cunha
item.description: Undergraduate student in Social Sciences - UFRJ, with applied knowledge in Python programming, data exploratory analysis in R, and statistics (studies conducted at UFRJ’s Actuarial Science).

item.title: Gabriely Silva Fraga
item.description: Undergraduate student in Social Sciences at the Federal University of Rio de Janeiro (UFRJ).

item.title: Sabrina Lima
item.description: Undergraduate student in Social Sciences at UFRJ and a volunteer researcher at UFRJ’s Digital Humanities Laboratory (LABHDUFRJ).

item.title: Renan Aguiar do Nascimento
item.description: Undergraduate student in Social Sciences Teaching at UFRJ, with a focus on the sociology of work, political sociology, and education.

item.title: Maria Lúcia Cordeiro
item.description: Undergraduate student in Social Sciences Teaching at UFRJ and a certified Occupational Safety Technician from CEFET-RJ.

item.title: Ready to build your next project with Hugo?
Research
item.description: Table of Contents Data Mining for Digital Humanities Analysis of Multi-Platform Ecosystems of Disinformation and Radicalization through Telegram Digital History Ethical, Social, and Political Implications of Digital Technoscience The Economy of Affectionate Exchanges: Market, Socialities, and Digital Media Data Mining for Digital Humanities The acquisition of computational skills in research practice across various fields of the humanities is one of the pillars of what is being called Digital Humanities.

item.title: Tools
item.description: Table of Contents Scielo tools Anped Scraper COMPOS Scraper Anpuh abstracts Scraper Anpuh Scraper pyHDB Digital Tools Wiki Scielo tools Provides tools for scraping, organizing, and analyzing scientific articles from Scielo.
